cms_block.title: Themecontrol Home Page
cms_block.content:
Customizable design

Unlimited Colors

You have never seen so many options! Change colors of dozens of elements, apply textures, upload background images...

See all features
12-column grid

Responsive Layout

Themecontrol can be displayed on any screen. It is based on fluid grid system. If screen is resized, layout will be automatically adjusted...

See all features
Customizable drop-down menu

Mega Menu

Two styles: wide mega menu or classic drop-down menu. You can add any custom content (images, text, HTML) to any category in the catalog...

See all features


{{block type="themecontrol/product_list_featured" category_id="15" product_count="16" show_items="5" is_responsive="1" breakpoints="[1680, 8], [1440, 7], [1360, 6], [1280, 6], [960, 5], [768, 4], [640, 3], [480, 2], [320, 1], [290,3]" is_random="0" block_name="See Our Featured Products" hide_button="1" template="catalog/product/list_featured_slider.phtml"}} {{block type="catalog/product_new" products_count="10" show_items="5" is_responsive="1" block_name="New Products in our Store" hide_button="1" template="catalog/product/new.phtml"}} {{block type="brands/brands" show_items="4" is_responsive="1" block_name="Product Brands" template="wsu/brands/brand_slider.phtml"}} Sample Custom Banners

cms_block.title: Themecontrol Themecontrol - Responsive Magento Theme | Download
cms_block.content: Add custom content in: CMS > Pages

cms_block.title: Themecontrol Home Page 2
cms_block.content:
Customizable design

Unlimited Colors

You have never seen so many options! Change colors of dozens of elements, apply textures, upload background images...

See all features
12-column grid

Responsive Layout

Themecontrol can be displayed on any screen. It is based on fluid grid system. If screen is resized, layout will be automatically adjusted...

See all features
Content placeholders

50+ CMS blocks

You can use content placeholders to display custom content in almost every part of the store. Import sample CMS blocks from the demo...

See all features


{{block type="themecontrol/product_list_featured" category_id="6" product_count="16" show_items="5" is_responsive="1" is_random="0" block_name="See Our Featured Products" hide_button="1" template="catalog/product/list_featured_slider.phtml"}} {{block type="catalog/product_new" products_count="10" show_items="6" is_responsive="1" block_name="New Products in our Store" hide_button="1" template="catalog/product/new.phtml"}} Sample Custom Banners

Sample Custom Banners


Here you can see some examples of banners.
Banners can be placed on any CMS page, and in any CMS block. Each banner is a simple image inside a link.
